|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L512E; |flash2size = 0.064 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2size = 128 |ram2chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 78:81:02 |oui = 78:81:02

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+,VDSL2,VoIP,UMTS |addchip = 5GHz WLAN Front End Module;Microsemi;LX5586H;MSC, 586H, 730F;4; ,,, 2ch 150V Tracking miSLIC FXS Interface IC;Microsemi;Le9672WQC;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Quantenna;QT3740BC; |rad2chip2 = Quantenna;QT2518B; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MS156 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Model Name: '''Vodafone H500-s''' ([[SerComm]])
"BXK00C-1.6" and "1735" is silkscreened on the board.
{{see also|Askey RTF3505VW-GV|MitraStar GPT-2541GNAC}}
===Specifications=== *Flash: [http://www.macronix.com/en-us/products/NOR-Flash/Serial-NOR-Flash/Pages/spec.aspx?p=MX25L512E&m=Serial%20NOR%20Flash&n=PM1669 Macronix MX25L512E] 64KB (Serial NOR) :512Kbit (x1/x2) 3V CMOS Flash Memory *[http://www.macronix.com/en-us/products/NAND-Flash/SLC-NAND-Flash/Pages/spec.aspx?p=MX30LF1G18AC&m=SLC%20NAND&n=PM2133 Macronix MX30LF1G18AC] 128MB (SLC NAND) :1Gbit x8 4-bit ECC 48-pin TSOP 3V SLC Flash *RAM: [http://www.nanya.com/cn/Product/3755/NT5CC64M16GP-DII Nanya NT5CC64M16GP] 128MB (DDR3L) :1Gbit 64Mx16 1.35V 96-Pin VFBGA SDRAM *PSU: PS30W120EUG20-BXK-00
'''Wi-Fi CERTIFIED N''' * 2.4 GHz, 5 GHz - Concurrent * 2 Spatial Streams 2.4 GHz * 3 Spatial Streams 5 GHz * Short Guard Interval * TX A-MPDU * STBC Transmit * 40 MHz operation in 2.4 GHz, with coexistence mechanisms * 40 MHz operation in 5 GHz * HT Duplicate Mode (MCS 32)
'''Wi-Fi CERTIFIED AC''' * 4 Spatial Streams 5 GHz * Rx MCS 8-9 (256-QAM) * Rx A-MPDU of A-MSDU * Tx SU beamformer * Low Density Parity Check coding
==Links of Interest== *[http://gualdacomunicaciones.blogspot.ru/2017/01/el-nuevo-router-avanzado-para-fibra-de.html Press release] *[https://alexfernandez.es/blog/2017/11/07/abrir-puerto-443-en-vodafone-h500-s/ ''Vodafone H500-s''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/sercomm/h500-s Sercom H 500-s OpenWrt Wiki]
===Source code=== *[https://mega.nz/#!K1JmCaDJ!MQ1mt8_jf5ydx1oXqr712mlTeNCdadrc24s5ezSRWqM H500s V3305.rar]
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== * '''baudrate''': 115200 {| class="wikitable" |- | GND || TX || VCC || RX |- ! ■ !! ■ !! ■ !! ■ |- | ▷ 1 || 2 || 3 || 4 |}
